text: hi everyone its Alan here today I will

Frost and now when I talk about Frost

wing and fish very interesting if you

feel free to replace with chicken or

it to add a little bit of salt into the
fry oil then gently adding the frogs and
pan fry until golden brown on both sides
fry on medium heat and series golden
brown on one side and then turn them
over to fry the other side then remove
the frost from the OI into a strainer to
bring off the excess oil now in a

keep the heat on medium low to avoid

is really amazing now in a mortar and

paste into the Vsauce
now remove the oil from the pan that
will fry them lemongrass earlier come
buy together the fried frogs the fried

minutes until the froth absorbed the
tasty sauce give it a really good toss
it's actually better if you do like this
because if you stir too much using

fall apart that's it
now just transfer to a serving plates

fragrant
